ing: 1 firm ripe pear, cored and thinly sliced
2 tablespoons YoplaitÂ® Original French Vanilla yogurt
des: "Thin slices of pear are drizzled with vanilla yogurt and chocolate hazelnut spread, then topped with toasted hazelnuts for a quick and delicious snack."
ins:
Stir together chocolate-hazelnut spread and milk.
Spread the pear slices on a large plate and drizzle with yogurt and hazelnut spread mixture. Sprinkle with hazelnuts and serve.
